units: Conversion fraction (from baseline technology to HP)
source: Guidehouse market research for E3 Initiative, 2021
notes: Values represent conversion percentages for switching heating/water heating equipment to heat pumps from the baseline technology in each year. Conversion percentages for the base year are taken from Guidehouse's conservative scenario, and all other percentages are from the listed scenario, specified in ten-year increments and interpolated to yield annual values. For Commercial Water Heating, projections are not available, so values match the Optimistic scenario for Commercial Space Heating, and 2050 values are assumed to be 40% for both existing and new buildings based on NREL's Electrification Futures Study 'High' scenario (Mai et al., 2018).
